categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords
Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Dvakvar Grahrk was a Devaronian Jedi Knight during the Jedi Civil War. He was known as a Sith hunter, and explored Korriban in his attempts to eliminate all Sith.

Dvakvar Grahrk was originally designed to be a part of the Jedi Exile's party, but was replaced late in production by the Disciple, Mical. Prima Games, however, managed to obtain footage of his character before it was cut from the game and included it in an unlockable portion of their DVD guide to The Sith Lords.
